titleStmt.title: The literal mans learning: or, The light of saints perfection in the life of grace. Printed for the author.
titleStmt.author: Lewes, Daniel, fl. 1657.

notesStmt.note: At end of "To the enquiring reader": Written by Daniel Lewes, a believer of the Testimony of Jesus, born in the parish of Membury, in the county of Devon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
